item.description: Hi folks I plan to sail this weekend Sunday at 1PM for a 4 or 5 hour run from the saltwater club in Hull, I have three spots. I give preference to folks who I have worked with before. Let me know by e mail I will confirm with you if you’re in. If for some reason you can’t attend let me know so I can give the spot to some else. Beach traffic will be tough and the club is at the other end of the beach so leave plenty of time. plenty of free parking.
item.name: Sailing Sunday from Hull in a Merrit 25
